body.name: Tvilum 6 Drawer Double Dresser, Black Woodgrain
body.description: With ample storage, the Scottsdale 6 Drawer Double Dresser is an easy way to keep your belongings organized. From delicates to bulky items the Scottsdale 6 Drawer Double Dresser can store various items while offering a modern, sleek look that merges seamlessly with any décor. With metal drawer glides for smooth movement the double dresser is a sturdy, yet simply designed piece. The foil finish is easy to clean, scratch, and stain resistant making it an ideal choice for families or college living. Combine this dresser with other Scottsdale bedroom pieces to complete the look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little mixed up about this
reviews.reviewText: I had this dresser for about 2 years, through those years it did an amazing job holding together. That was up until i had moved locations. The dresser did not hold very good structure during the move do to it only having wood pegs and wood glue to hold the general construction of it together. I feel as if there was an extra packet of the wood glue it may have survived the move better. (Side note, while moving this dresser it was me and 2 other people. One held onto the center and two at the side. Sadly the structure was just not strong enough. The drawers were all removed for the move as well. Other than this instance though I absolutely loved this dresser. Personally would buy again and would just add my own structural support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small dresser. Small drawers. Great price and look
reviews.reviewText: For the price, it's a great dresser. It's smaller than I thought it'd be. It looks very minimalistic. I love the color and the sleekness, but the drawers are very small. It also took over 2 hours to put together. The instructions were easy to follow, especially if you watch the video instructions (have to scan to pull it up on your phone -or maybe it's an app download, don't remember). If you want a nice black dresser on a budget this might be the best option. But if you don't care too much about the color, I think the Ikea Malm dresser might be better because the drawers are bigger. The Ikea Malm dresser just doesn't come in true black. But it's cheaper and takes just as long to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money!
reviews.reviewText: The dresser came in two boxes. The directions weren't really easy to read. There were a few times in the process where I had to take it apart and move things around because I had put something in the wrong hole or wood turned the wrong way. The instructions tell you to use wood glue (included) when adding two pieces of wood onto the bottom part of the top long piece of the dresser. I put the glue on, as directed, and pushed the pieces into the predrilled holes. When it came time to put the top onto the dresser I could not get it to go down! After looking I realized the two pieces of wood I glued on were too long. There was a piece of wood in the middle of the dresser that was meant to fit perfectly between them. Because they were glued, I had no option to remove them and drill more holes. I literally had to shave the edges of each piece off so they would fit and the top of the dresser would go on. Doing so chipped the black coating and it looks horrible! The dresser overall really wouldn't have been bad for the price if I didn't have to tear it up to put it together. If you're unsatisfied you can either return the dresser (how am I going to return a dresser assembled and glued together?), get a replacement piece (I can't remove the defect pieces to put on the replacement because they are glued on) or accept a 10% refund to keep as it is. Customer service stinks. I will not purchase from buyer again. Save your money and go buy a cheaper dresser from Walmart that can actually be assembled properly.UPDATE: Two months later it's falling apart. The drawers won't even close properly. The seller did send me a replacement front to one of the drawers because a corner snapped off when I was trying to open it (it was stuck). I have 2 pairs of jeggings, 5 cotton shorts and 5 leggings (not heavy at all) and the bottom of the drawer is falling through and it won't close.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this dresser in 2020 and I still have it but it’s all beat up now. It’s sturdy enough to hold a tv, my ps5, couple miscellaneous items that add up to the weight which is reliable. I don’t like that the drawers are too tiny and please do not overfill bc it will break. Overtime it just kept falling apart. I will recommend if someone has abit of clothes and is careful with it. I didn’t like that the. If board on top came at first broken but they did bring me another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The good: overall this dresser is sturdy and has a good amount of storage. It also looks very visually good. It's one of the most sturdy and affordable dressers in its size.The bad: the assembly instructions are laughable. Unclear in a lot of places. It's a good thing I've assembled a lot of furniture in the past. The components are also poorly labeled.Mine also arrived slightly damaged in two spots. I don't know if that happened during shipping or before, so I won't blame them for that.Overall it goes well in my girls' room, and I'm thinking it'll last longer than their previous dressers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Just got this drawer today may 10 2019 ... it is really nice not only for the money just in general ... it is sturdy . It is nice . It has a really cool look to it in person. I’m very pleased ... I’m getting glass cut to fit the top of this drawer so drinks or anything don’t leave a stain ... not that the material is cheap... I REALLY RECOMMEND if you plan on buying this drawer you get it with assembly because it’s a pain in the ass to assemble .. i paid for assembly but me and the assembler both looked at the instructions and it’s really hard if your trying yourself because the screws all come in ONE bag mixed up .. u have to basically guess which ones go where and the instructions would be the same if it was a blank sheet of paper luckily he took 5 hours not the whole day to assemble so just looking out.!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good as expected aesthetic looks. Quite delicate for light item only.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun to put together
reviews.reviewText: Just pay attention. I love putting furniture together, but this came with some challenges. You can't absent-mindedly do this or you're going to mess something up. Apparently words are too much to ask for and instructions are all in pictures. So just pay attention when you hammer in those wood screws. You do not want to have to try to get that back out. The board will shatter. Just pay attention to what you're doing, and this is an easy fun dresser to put together. It's also huge and pretty. I will take pics later. Sturdy too. Could be used as a TV Stand as well or add a nice mirror to it. Lots of space for accent decor.
